Cherrycake\UiComponentTooltip::buildContentItem

buildContentItem

Intended to be used by the buildContent method, builds the HTML for a single item for the tooltip's contents

    Signature

    public function buildContentItem(integer $type, The $setup )

    Parameters

    $type — integer
    One of the available UICOMPONENTTOOLTIP_CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE_* consts
    $setup — object
    setup options for the item, as specified in buildContent


    Returns

    string
    The HTML for the given item
